ai.title: AI Configuration
ai.subtitle: Configure your AI providers for intelligent content analysis

extraction.title: HTML Content Extraction (First API Call)
extraction.description: Used to extract magnet links and basic information from search result pages
extraction.helpText: Your API key is stored securely and only used for AI analysis

analysis.title: Content Analysis (Second API Call)
analysis.description: Used to analyze content quality, generate tags, and clean titles
analysis.helpText: Your API key is stored securely and only used for AI analysis
analysis.batchSizeHelp: Number of search results to analyze in a single API call (1-20). Lower values are faster but may hit rate limits due to more frequent requests.

download.title: Download Configuration
download.subtitle: Configure how magnet links are opened for quick downloading
download.applicationPathHelp: Path to your preferred application for handling magnet links (e.g., qBittorrent, uTorrent, 115 Browser, etc.)
download.autoClosePageHelp: Automatically close the download page after 10 seconds
download.enableQuickDownloadHelp: Show a quick download button next to each magnet link in search results

data.title: Data & Configuration
data.subtitle: Manage application data and configuration files

applicationData.title: Application Data
applicationData.description: All settings including API keys, custom engines, priorities, and favorites are saved in app_data.json.

appInfo.name: ðŸ§² AI Magnet Assistant
appInfo.description: An intelligent magnet link search and optimization tool powered by AI.

messages.pleaseEnterApiKey: Please enter an API key for {type} config first
